data.title: Trillion Parameter Models, Tiny Software Kernels, And The Future Of AI
data.description: In an era of trillion-parameter models, we’ve forgotten how to build simple, trustworthy software. Niklaus Wirth’s legacy offers a blueprint to fix that.
data.author: Amir Husain
